extension.summary: This script addon automates the creation of an XBMC Live bootable removable disk.
extension.description: Bootable Disk Wizard (BDW) is designed to be executed from the live CD/live removable disk, but can also run out of a traditional disk installation provided that its addon settings are properly set.
XBMC-LIVE indítható lemezt tudsz készíteni ezzel a kiegészítővel
